verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
I shall know.... Him,
I shall know Him,
And redeemed by His side
I shall stand,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I shall know.... Him,
I shall know Him,
By the print of the nails
in His hand.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
I shall know my Redeemer when
I reach the other side,
And His smile will be the first
to welcome me.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Oh, the soul thrilling rapture when
I view His blessed face,
And the luster of His kindly beaming eye;
How my full heart will praise

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Him for the mercy,
love, and grace,
That prepare for me a mansion
in the sky.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Oh, the dear ones in glory,
how they beckon me to come,
And our parting
at the river I recall;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
To the sweet vales of
Eden they will sing
my welcome home;
But I long to meet my Savior
first of all.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Throâ€™ the gates to the city in a
robe of spotless white,
He will lead me where
no tears will ever fall;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
In the glad song of ages I shall
mingle with delight;
But I long to meet my Savior
first of all.
